channel.title: How do i add unmute command
channel.description: can anyone tell me how to add unmute code?

item.title: How do i add unmute command
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“unmute”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                p.mutedate = 0;
                p.muted = 0;
        
        sm("You have unmuted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to unmute..");
            }

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add unmute command

item.title: How do i add unmute command
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“unmute”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                p.mutedate = 0;
                p.muted = 0;
        
        sm("You have unmuted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sm("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sm("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }[/code] add it in client class work the rest out.
